Package com.intellij.codeInspection.reference

Class RefManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.codeInspection.reference.RefManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RefManagerImpl

    public abstract class RefManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manager of the reference graph for a global inspection run.
    See Also:
    GlobalInspectionContext.getRefManager()

        Returns:

      • getRefModule

        public abstract RefModule getRefModule(Module module)
        Creates (if necessary) and returns the reference graph node for the specified module.
        Parameters:
        module - the module for which the reference graph node is requested.
        Returns:
        the node for the module, or null if module is null.

      • getReference

        public abstract RefElement getReference(PsiElement elem)
        Creates (if necessary) and returns the reference graph node for the specified PSI element.
        Parameters:
        elem - the element for which the reference graph node is requested.
        Returns:
        the node for the element, or null if the element is not valid or does not have a corresponding reference graph node type (is not a field, method, class or file).

      • getReference

        public abstract RefEntity getReference(java.lang.String type,
                                       java.lang.String fqName)
        Creates (if necessary) and returns the reference graph node for the PSI element specified by its type and FQName.
        Parameters:
        type - SmartRefElementPointer#FILE, etc.
        fqName - fully qualified name for the element
        Returns:
        the node for the element, or null if the element is not found or does not have a corresponding reference graph node type.
